sentences.en: In conclusion, we've decided to adopt the new strategy. (variant 1)

sentences.kr: 김 과장님이 이 프로젝트를 담당하시게 됩니다. (v1)
sentences.en: Manager Kim will be responsible for this project. (variant 1)
We need to complete the report by next week. (variant 1)
Let me summarize what we discussed today. (variant 1)
The next meeting will be on Monday. (variant 1)
We need to develop an action plan. (variant 1)
We'll track progress through weekly reports. (variant 1)
We made three decisions in this meeting. (variant 1)
These are the items that require follow-up. (variant 1)
Thank you all for your participation. (variant 1)
In conclusion, we've decided to adopt the new strategy. (variant 2)
